name: wc3-translate
description: utils for translating a wc3 map

scripts.toJson: node .\toJson.js "..\eden\eden 5.8h\korean 5.8h_un.w3x" "..\eden\eden 5.8f\eng 5.8f_un.w3x" "..\eden\eden 5.8f\korean 5.8f_un.w3x" .\data\output.yaml ignorePlayers.js ignoreStrings.js setChanged.js setKorean.js guessTranslations.js setOnlySpacingDiff.js setUntranslated.js exportTokens.js .\data\tokens.txt koreanExportToken

author: juvian
